Organization based in.content:

Paragraph: Security Forces Widen Ban on Possession of Arms NC0302223394 Paris AFP in English 2200 GMT 3 Feb 94

| --- | --- | --- |

The text mentions "AFP in English 2200 GMT 3 Feb 94" which indicates that AFP (Agence France-Presse) is based in Paris, France. Therefore, there is a valid relationship between AFP and Paris, where AFP is headquartered or primarily operates.
